column6: The impossible has happened: the Mental Organism Designed Only for Killing has fallen head over heels in love! But with the love of his life caught in the crosshairs of Killville's most ruthless mercenaries, can M.O.D.O.K. hope to stay one step aHEAD of his rivals and live long enough to find out who set her up?
column8: | penciller (cover):David Lafuente | artist:Amilcar Pinna | writer:Chris Yost
